comment.author: 9582390@N02
comment._content:
The Connie never went to the boneyard for storage at Davis Monthan AFB...she went to Florence SC to be treated like a '66 Olds junker by the hammer heads that abandoned it there.
Dave Hill, Connie Crew 1982

comment.author: 58541577@N08
comment._content: I cried when I first saw the pictures of GD12 laying on the ground as junk.  I was the last "qualifiied" aircrew on her until we retired her in 1982.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Nice photo, sad story. Added to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Davis%E2%80%93Monthan_Air_Force_Bas... Thanks for posting these!
